description: Retrieves the definition of a report already configured in AWS Application Cost Profiler.

parameters.name: reportId
parameters.description: ID of the report to retrieve.

nested_items.name: reportFrequency
nested_items.description: Cadence used to generate the report.

nested_items.name: destinationS3Location
nested_items.description: Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) location where the report is uploaded.

nested_items.name: prefix
nested_items.description: Prefix for the location to write to.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: when this report definition was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdated
nested_items.description: when this report definition was last updated.
